r.s: PHP Bindings for the Subversion Revision control system.
r.d: Bindings for the Subversion revision control system, providing a method for manipulating a working copy or repository with PHP.
r.n: - Fix bug #13414 - Crash when SVN environment fails to initialise. - Fix bug #13677,#13162 - Several functions fail to canonicalized resulting in an abort() call. - Revert change that prevented libsvn 1.3 from being used. - Add check during configure for minimum libsvn version. - Add support for svn_delete(), svn_mkdir(), svn_move(), svn_proplist() and svn_propget(). - Allow svn_commit() to take a string instead of an array for paths. - Revert backwards compatible break with svn_log()
